attributes.action: create Dog Parks in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see specific dog parks opened, where dogs can play off leash in a safe, enclosed enviroment. There would be designated Dog Bins and seperate areas for smaller and large dogs to play. 

By creating Dog Parks (monitored or unmonitored) it would create a safer enviroment for dogs, it would allow them to socialize and seperate them from Public Parks where some people may have dog phobias.
